question: Who was the first congress activist to demand Poorna Swaraj from the British in the Ahmedabad session of 1921?
explanation: Maulana Hasrat Mohani was the first congress activist to demand complete independence (Poorna Swaraj) from the British in the Ahmedabad session of congress in 1921. He was a noted poet of the Urdu language. Excerpts of his works are Kulliyat-e-Hasrat Mohani, Nukaat-e-Sukhan, Mushahidaat-e-Zindaan, etc.
